testcase.classname: Add product to cart on SauceDemo
testcase.name: Add an existing product to cart
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged in to SauceDemo........................................passed When User adds the first product to the cart................................passed Then Cart badge shows 1 item................................................passed

testcase.classname: Add product to cart on SauceDemo
testcase.name: Attempt to checkout with empty cart
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged in to SauceDemo........................................passed When User clicks the cart icon with empty cart..............................passed And User proceeds to checkout...............................................passed Then User sees error message for empty cart.................................passed

testcase.name: Full checkout process and logout
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the SauceDemo login page......................................passed And I have valid username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce".......passed When I login with valid credentials.........................................passed And I open the menu.........................................................passed Then the Logout link should be visible......................................passed And I should see the page title "Products"..................................passed When I navigate to the first product detail page............................passed Then I should see the product name on detail page...........................passed When I add the product to the cart..........................................passed Then I should see a "Remove" button for that product........................passed When I go to the cart page..................................................passed Then I should see the product "Sauce Labs Backpack" in the cart.............passed When I click the checkout button............................................passed Then I should be on the checkout information page...........................passed When I enter first name "Jan" and last name "Novak" and postal code "10400".passed And I continue to the overview page.........................................passed Then I should be on the checkout overview page..............................passed And I should see the product "Sauce Labs Backpack" in overview..............passed When I logout from the application..........................................passed Then I should be on the login page..........................................passed

testcase.name: Successful login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the SauceDemo login page......................................passed When I enter username "standard_user".......................................passed And I enter password "secret_sauce".........................................passed And I click the login button................................................passed Then I should be on the Products page.......................................passed And I should see a title "Products".........................................passed

testcase.name: Failed login with invalid username
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the SauceDemo login page......................................passed When I enter username "invalid_user"........................................passed And I enter password "secret_sauce".........................................passed And I click the login button................................................passed Then I should see login error message.......................................passed And I should still be on the login page.....................................passed

testcase.name: Failed login with invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the SauceDemo login page......................................passed When I enter username "standard_user".......................................passed And I enter password "wrong_password".......................................passed And I click the login button................................................passed Then I should see login error message.......................................passed And I should still be on the login page.....................................passed

testcase.name: Failed login with empty credentials
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the SauceDemo login page......................................passed When I clear username field.................................................passed And I clear password field..................................................passed And I click the login button................................................passed Then I should see validation error message..................................passed
